text: Plait may refer to: * Plait, also called a braid, intertwined strands of, for example, textile or hair * Plait, now called a pleat, a fold of fabric, used in clothing and upholstery * Plait (gastropod), a fold in the columella of a gastropod mollusc * Plaiting in basketry * Phil Plait, American astronomer, skeptic and blogger
title: Plait
